mapper.select:
select ptc.integrationid__c as rsaIntegrationId , ptc.row_id as id , TO_CHAR(ptc.testdriverequestdate__c::timestamp,'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS-0300') as testDriveDate , ptc.testdriverequesttime__c as testDriveTime , (case when ptc.testdriveconfirmed__c = 't' then 'Y' when ptc.testdriveconfirmed__c = 'f' then 'N' end) as testDriveConfirmed , TO_CHAR(ptc.legacy_created,'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS-0300') as created , ptc.legacy_created_by as createdBy , TO_CHAR(ptc.legacy_last_upd,'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS-0300') as updated , ptc.legacy_last_upd_by as updatedBy , pa.firstname as salesRepFirstName , pa.lastname as salesRepLastName , ptc.dealercode__c as dealer , sr.integrationid__c as codigoSAPTD , ptc.conflict_id as conflictId , ptc.protocolid__c as protocol , ptc.status__c as status , ptc.relatedmodel__c as model , ptc.contact_id__c as contactId , ptc.level2__c as area , pa.cpf__c as cpf , ptc."SourceTag__c" as origem , ptc.row_id as srId , ptc.dealercode__c as selectedSRRoutingDealerCode from process.testdrivehistory ptc join process.account pa on ptc.contact_id__c = pa.row_id join process.service_request sr on ptc.protocolid__c = sr.protocol__c where 1=1
and ptc.legacy_last_upd = to_date(#{dateInput}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
and ptc.legacy_created = to_date(#{dateInput}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
